#bc03  
###    convert Tom_14_table1.txt etc by hand into supergrid form
#Galaxy Stellar Mass Functions from ZFOURGE/CANDELS: 
#An Excess of Low-Mass Galaxies Since z=2 and the Rapid Buildup of Quiescent Galaxies
#http://arxiv.org/abs/1309.5972
##   h100=0.70, omega0=0.30, omegaL=0.70
##   Chabrier (2003) IMF, 1 Msun, Av between [0,4]
## 
# 1 zlo - lower redshift bound
# 2 zhi - upper redshift bound
# 3 ngal in primus, here just placehold- number of galaxies in bin
# 4 mass - center of stellar mass bin [log Msun]
# 5 limit - 1=above 95% M/L completeness limit-here just placeholder
# 6 phi - number density (log Mpc^-3 dex^-1)
# 7 phierr_lo - lower 1-sigma Poisson uncertainty on PHI (dex)
# 8 phierr_up - upper 1-sigma Poisson uncertainty on PHI (dex)
#
# zlo zhi -placeholder- logm[M_o] -place- phi [log mpc^-3 dex-1] phierr_lo phierr_up blank 
#phierr_lo/hi-lower/upper 1-sigma Poisson uncertainty on PHI (dex) 
   0.20   0.50  999 8.00  1  -1.3700   0.0700   0.0600  0.000 
  0.20   0.50  999 8.25  1  -1.5300   0.0700   0.0600  0.000
